• Since 2007
BHMHS

Beautiful Hearts & Minds Health Services is a behavioral health organization that provides psychiatric rehabilitation programs to clients and provides the best service so they can have a more enjoyable life and achieve their goals.

Developed the information architecture, designed website using Sketch and developed on Wordpress platform.

Skills Used:
  • UX/UI Design
  • Web Development
While working as a Front-end Developer at HAVAS, a digital agency located in Baltimore, MD and headquartered in France, I contributed to the redesign of Bertolli's website.
